pr_title: DHFPROD-4570: User admin cannot write artifacts to ML DB

timeline.bodyText:
asserting same thing twice?
can we rename lstTypeInfo to listTypeInfo. Adding an "i" makes it clearer.
timeline.author: bsrikan

timeline.bodyText: Can you add an assertion message to explain why an admin user can update, but not read? That of course is surprising behavior - normally a user can read but not update (or can do both). According to the JIRA ticket, it's to allow an admin to write artifacts during deployment - I think it's important that an assertion message captures that.
timeline.author: rjrudin
